author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Watch Live: President Trump’s Coronavirus Task Force Holds Press Conference
description: President Donald Trump’s coronavirus task force will host a press briefing at the White House on Monday, scheduled for 5:00 p.m. EST. The president and his team continue to talk about the fight to contain the spread of the virus
content:
President Donald Trumps coronavirus task force will host a press briefing at the White House on Monday, scheduled for 5:00 p.m. EST.
The president and his team continue to talk about the fight to contain the spread of the virus as well as support Americans s… [+101 chars]
